Class FileHandler

java.lang.Object
shopinventorymanager.utils.FileHandler
public class FileHandler extends Object
Handles all file operations for the Shop Inventory Manager. This class manages reading and writing item data to persistent storage.
Author:
meheralimeer

    • getNextId

      public static int getNextId() throws IOException
      Generates the next available ID for a new item.
      Returns:
      The next sequential ID number
      Throws:
      IOException - If there's an error reading the file

      public static void saveItem(Item item) throws IOException
      Saves a new item to the file.
      Parameters:
      item - The item to be saved
      Throws:
      IOException - If there's an error writing to the file

    • loadItems

      public static List<Item> loadItems() throws IOException
      Loads all items from the file.
      Returns:
      List of all items stored in the file
      Throws:
      IOException - If there's an error reading the file

      Updates an existing item in the file.
      Parameters:
      updatedItem - The item with updated information
      Throws:
      IOException - If there's an error writing to the file
